level.text: Persons who are authorized by the organizer of a licensed Special Event to vend within the boundaries of a licensed Special Event may vend without a Vending Business License or Vending Site Permit.

A vendor authorized to vend within the boundaries of a licensed Special Event area shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding the registration of vendor’s business with the Office of Tax and Revenue and DCRA and shall comply with any standards imposed by DOH or other relevant agencies.
